sentences.en: He was rubbling his sore scalp.
He's still a sore point about his sister's death.
sentences.cn: 他对姐姐之死仍然感到十分难过.

sentences.en: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
I had a sore throat and could only croak.
sentences.cn: 我喉咙痛，只能哑着嗓子说话。

sentences.en: I'm out of action with a sore back.
I've got a sore place in my back.
If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentences.en: Losing the election was a sore disappointment.
sentences.cn: 竞选失败令人痛心失望.

sentences.en: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.cn: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.en: Mary has a bad cold and sore throat.
sentences.cn: 玛丽患了重感冒而且咽喉痛.

sentences.en: Sore throats may be relieved by cold compresses.
sentences.cn: 喉咙痛用冷敷布敷一下可能会好一些。

sentences.en: They are sore about losing to England in the quarter-finals.
sentences.cn: 他们对在四分之一决赛里输给英格兰队这件事感到非常懊恼。

sentences.en: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.cn: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

sentences.en: This medicine should soothe your sore throat.
sentences.cn: 这种药会减轻你的喉痛.

sentences.en: Though the sore being healed, yet a scar may remain.
sentences.cn: 伤口虽然痊愈, 却可能留下伤疤.

phrases.tran_cn: （谈话中应当回避的）痛处（或伤心事）

phrases.phrase: stand (或 stick) out like a sore thumb
phrases.tran_cn: 显得很不自然；与周围的人（或事物）格格不入

trans.tran_cn: 疼痛的，使人伤心的，恼火的，发怒的
trans.tran_en: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection
